catalog_script_client.name: ErrMessage if space !available on role

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_11187d1797de8110002ffef3a253afcf
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>false</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reserve A Space">bcde9043971a4110002ffef3a253af2f</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:9d9ca4c3975a4110002ffef3a253afd0</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>ErrMessage if space !available on role</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	var script = new GlideAjax("VerifySpaceAccessibility");
	
	script.addParam("sysparm_name", "isRoomOrOffice");
	script.addParam("sysparm_spaceID", newValue);
	
	if(g_user.hasRoleExactly("x_616811_coworking.patron") == false || g_user.hasRoleExactly("x_616811_coworking.manager") == false ||    
		g_user.hasRoleExactly("x_616811_coworking.admin") == false || g_user.hasRoleExactly("admin") == false ){
		script.getXML(getAnswer);
	}
	function getAnswer(response){
		var scriptResponse = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		if(scriptResponse == "true" ){
			g_form.addInfoMessage("Private spaces can only be reserved by registered users");
			g_form.clearValue("space");
		}
	}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-23 03:09:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>11187d1797de8110002ffef3a253afcf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ErrMessage if space !available on role</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Coworking space Reservation System" source="x_616811_coworking">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Coworking space Reservation System">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_11187d1797de8110002ffef3a253afcf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-01 03:04:55</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
